pr_title: Fixes null on request or response unwrap and deprecates adapters

timeline.message:
Fixes null on request or response unwrap and deprecates adapters

Our adapters would never expect the raw request to be null, so this uses
a dummy value to prevent NPEs.

This also backfills our adapters to 100% coverage on paths that are
called.
